description.zh-cn: 原隶属于中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部的一所高等院校，旨在培养外贸专业人才。1994年11月15日并入南开大学，其校址成为南开大学迎水道校区。
description.en: A former higher education institution under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation of the People's Republic of China, aimed at cultivating foreign trade professionals. It was merged into Nankai University on November 15, 1994, and its campus became the Yingshuidao Campus of Nankai University.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部
en: Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院曾经的组成部门，负责对外贸易与经济合作。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for foreign trade and economic cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国天津市的著名综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A renowned comprehensive research university located in Tianjin, China.

description.zh-cn: 天津对外贸易学院院长。
description.en: President of Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院副总理、天津市副市长及对外贸易经济合作部部长。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as Vice Premier of the State Council, Vice Mayor of Tianjin, and Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国教育部的前身，曾是负责管理全国教育事业的国务院组成部门。
description.en: The predecessor of the Ministry of Education of the People's Republic of China, formerly a constituent department of the State Council responsible for managing national education.

description.zh-cn: 由原天津对外贸易学院师资参与组建的南开大学下属学院，后更名为南开大学商学院。
description.en: A school of Nankai University established with the participation of faculty from the former Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade, later renamed Nankai University Business School.

description.zh-cn: 1978年以来中华人民共和国推行的一系列经济及政治体制改革政策的总称。
description.en: The general term for a series of economic and political system reform policies implemented by the People's Republic of China since 1978.

en: Shanghai University of International Business and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国上海市的一所财经类大学，原为对外贸易经济合作部直属高校。
description.en: A university of finance and economics located in Shanghai, China, formerly directly under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

description.zh-cn: 曾隶属于对外贸易经济合作部的一所高等院校。
description.en: A former higher education institution under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国俄亥俄州肯特市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Kent, Ohio, United States.

en: University of International Business and Economics

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所财经类大学，原为对外贸易经济合作部直属高校。
description.en: A university of finance and economics located in Beijing, China, formerly directly under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

description.zh-cn: 改革开放后，为满足中国发展对外贸易对专业人才的迫切需求，对外贸易部决定筹建天津对外贸易学院。
description.en: After the Reform and Opening-up, to meet the urgent need for professionals in China's foreign trade development, the Ministry of Foreign Trade decided to establish the Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部投资兴建并管理天津对外贸易学院。
description.en: The Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation of the People's Republic of China invested in, built, and managed the Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 天津对外贸易学院是对外贸易经济合作部直属的四所高校之一。
description.en: The Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade was one of the four higher education institutions directly under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

description.zh-cn: 时任副总理李岚清提议将天津对外贸易学院并入南开大学。
description.en: Then Vice Premier Li Lanqing proposed the merger of Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade into Nankai University.

description.zh-cn: 国家教育委员会与外经贸部签署协议，正式批准天津对外贸易学院并入南开大学。
description.en: The State Education Commission and the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation signed an agreement to formally approve the merger of Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade into Nankai University.

description.zh-cn: 天津对外贸易学院并入南开大学，原建制被撤销。
description.en: Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade was merged into Nankai University, and its original establishment was abolished.

description.zh-cn: 南开大学在原天津对外贸易学院的基础上组建了南开大学国际商学院。
description.en: Nankai University established the Nankai University International Business School on the basis of the former Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade.

description.zh-cn: 天津对外贸易学院的师资在并入南开大学后，参与组建了南开大学国际商学院。
description.en: After the merger into Nankai University, the faculty of Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade participated in the establishment of Nankai University International Business School.

description.zh-cn: 天津对外贸易学院与美国肯特州大学管理学院建立姊妹院校关系。
description.en: Tianjin Institute of Foreign Trade established a sister institution relationship with the College of Business Administration at Kent State University in the United States.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 北京对外贸易学院（后更名为对外经济贸易大学）为外经贸部直属高校之一。
description.en: Beijing Institute of Foreign Trade (later renamed University of International Business and Economics) was one of the institutions directly under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 上海对外贸易学院（后更名为上海对外经贸大学）为外经贸部直属高校之一。
description.en: Shanghai Institute of Foreign Trade (later renamed Shanghai University of International Business and Economics) was one of the institutions directly under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部

description.zh-cn: 广州对外贸易学院为外经贸部直属高校之一。
description.en: Guangzhou Institute of Foreign Trade was one of the institutions directly under the Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Co-operation.
